General.Name: Poznanska Korporacja Budowlana Pekabex SA
General.Description: Pekabex S.A., a construction company, engages in the production and sale of prefabricated reinforced and pre-stressed concrete elements in Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Germany, Switzerland, Hungary, and internationally. It offers foundations, poles, floor and roof beams, slabs, stadiums, walls, and engineering prefabricated elements; and other elements, such as bridge abutments, prefabricated shells, tanks, fountain basins, and stairs. The company also executes special orders for individual designs; and provides consulting, designing, transportation, and assembly services, as well as general contracting services. Its products are used in construction of industrial, retail, office, cultural and sports facilities, halls, residential buildings, bridges, and other large-scale structures. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Poznan, Poland.
